Viewer.help-controls:
Player controls (when applicable) are located in the top-left corner, the repeat button can switch between continuous or looped playback.
Found a funny moment? The play/pause button lets you pause the content.
Viewer.help-quickdetails:
Bottom-left corner contains quick details of what you're looking at.
Title of the file, description, uploader, file-type and view count is stored here.
Viewer.help-navcard:
Right side of the site is the navigation card, this comes out of sight when you're watching content, but can be retrieved through clicking the hamburger menu icon, right-clicking anywhere, or scrolling downwards.
In this page it contains full details and comments for the content. The sitemap is located here.

Settings.details-desc: Profile details will be shown here if you upload
Settings.filter-label: Which categories of files do you wish to filter from the viewer?
Settings.nsfw-label: Allow not safe for work content to be shown on Doki

Modes.modes-desc: Welcome to modes, this is where you can choose a specialized mode of Doki to enhance your experience.
Modes.tv-desc: Experience a binge-worthy stream of content with a layout tailored for your TV
Modes.vr-desc: Transcend all dimensions with this layout exclusively designed to work with VR headsets
Modes.ss-desc: Stream your session to your friends and watch together
